about_the_game:
Ninpaw is a fast-paced action game in which 2 to 4 cats go up against each other in different game modes!

The game can only be played locally with a controller. However, it is possible to play up to 4 cats online with a single game, thanks to Steam Remote Play.

🐱 Ninja cats

Take on the role of a ninja cat and engage in frenetic battles! Master the attack, the dash, the bomb and the star to achieve victory. Only the most agile and strategic cat will emerge victorious.

🏆 Multiple game modes

Play through a variety of game modes in different rounds. Take on your opponents in a merciless fight to the death, hold on to the crown for as long as possible, pass a bomb to victory or compete to collect coins faster than your opponents!

The game features a multitude of levels that can be played in most modes.

Don't forget to try and unlock the Steam achievements!

🎉 Fun for everyone

Whether you're a skilled player or a fighting game novice, Ninpaw offers a gameplay experience accessible to all. Easy to learn, yet difficult to master, this game guarantees hours of entertainment for players of all levels. Fun for all!

🎮 How to play NINPAW

  • Throw out your opponents with your 4 attacks

  • Be reactive to avoid falling into the void

  • Focus on the objectives

👥 Play local multiplayer

You can also use Steam Remote Play Together to play with your friends online, free of charge.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-5257U, AMD Ryzen 3 1200 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050, AMD RX 460 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
